    chapter 15. ì˜ë¯¸ë¡ ì  ì´ë™ê³¼ ìŠ¤ë§ˆíŠ¸ í¬ì¸í„°

    15.4 std::move

    • #include <utility> í•´ì£¼ì–´ì•¼ ì‚¬ìš© ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤.
    • std::move(A)
      • A ë¥¼ R-valueë¡œ ë³€í™˜í•˜ì—¬ ì´ë™ìƒ ì„±ì í˜¹ì€ ì´ë™ ëŒ€ì… ì—°ì‚°ìê°€ í˜¸ì¶œë˜ê²Œë” í•œë‹¤.

    ğŸ”” std::move ì“°ê¸° ì „

    ğŸ“œAutoPtr.h

    • ë³µì‚¬ ìƒì„±ì, ì´ë™ ìƒì„±ì ë‘˜ ë‹¤ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆëŠ” ìƒí™©
    #include <iostream>
using namespace std;

template<typename T>
class AutoPtr
{
public:
	T* m_ptr;

public:
	AutoPtr(T* ptr = nullptr)
		:m_ptr(ptr) 
	{
		cout << "AutoPtr default constructor" << endl;
	}

	~AutoPtr()
	{
		cout << "AutoPtr destructor" << endl;

		if (m_ptr != nullptr) delete m_ptr;
	}

	AutoPtr(const AutoPtr& a) // ğŸ’ë³µì‚¬ ìƒì„±ìğŸ’ 
	{
		cout << "AutoPtr copy constructor" << endl;

		// deep copy
		m_ptr = new T;  
		*m_ptr = *a.m_ptr; // ğŸ“œResource.h ì˜ ëŒ€ì… ì—°ì‚°ì í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ì—¬ ê¹Šì€ ë³µì‚¬ ìˆ˜í–‰
			
	}

	AutoPtr& operator = (const AutoPtr& a) // ğŸ’ëŒ€ì… ì—°ì‚°ì ì˜¤ë²„ë¡œë”©ğŸ’
	{
		cout << "AutoPtr copy assignment" << endl;
		
		if (&a == this)
			return *this;

		if (m_ptr != nullptr) delete m_ptr;

		// deep copy
		m_ptr = new T;  
		*m_ptr = *a.m_ptr; // ğŸ“œResource.h ì˜ ëŒ€ì… ì—°ì‚°ì í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ì—¬ ê¹Šì€ ë³µì‚¬ ìˆ˜í–‰
														
		return *this;
	}
	//AutoPtr(const AutoPtr& a) = delete;
	//AutoPtr& operator = (**const** AutoPtr& a) = delete;  

	AutoPtr(AutoPtr&& a)  // ğŸ’ì´ë™ìƒì„±ìğŸ’
		:  m_ptr(a.m_ptr) // ì†Œìœ ê¶Œ ì´ì „
	{ 
		a.m_ptr = nullptr; // ì†Œìœ ê¶Œ ë°•íƒˆ
	
		cout << "AutoPtr move constructor" << endl;
	}

	AutoPtr& operator = (AutoPtr&& a)  // ğŸ’ì´ë™ ëŒ€ì… ì—°ì‚°ì ì˜¤ë²„ë¡œë”©ğŸ’ 
	{
		cout << "AutoPtr move assignment" << endl;

		if (&a == this)
			return *this;

		if (m_ptr != nullptr) delete m_ptr; 
		
		m_ptr = a.m_ptr;  // ì†Œìœ ê¶Œ ì´ì „
		a.m_ptr = nullptr;  // ì†Œìœ ê¶Œ ë°•íƒˆ

		return *this;
	}

	T& operator *() const { return *m_ptr; }
	T* operator ->() const { return m_ptr; }
	bool inNull() const { return m_ptr == nullptr; }
};

    ğŸ“œmain.cpp

    #include <iostream>

int main()
{
	{
		AutoPtr<Resource> res1(new Resource(10000000));

		cout << res1.m_ptr << endl;

		AutoPtr<Resource> res2 = res1; //  ë³µì‚¬ ìƒì„±ìê°€ í˜¸ì¶œëœë‹¤. res1ì€ L-Valueë‹ˆê¹Œ 

		cout << res1.m_ptr << endl;
		cout << res2.m_ptr << endl;
	}
}

    • ë³µì‚¬ ìƒì„±ìê°€ í˜¸ì¶œëœë‹¤.
      • ë³µì‚¬ ëŒ€ìƒì´ ë˜ëŠ” res1 ì€ L-Value ë‹ˆê¹Œ R-valueë§Œ ë°›ëŠ” ì´ë™ ìƒì„±ìëŠ” ì´ë¥¼ ë°›ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ.

    ğŸ”” std::move ë¡œ ì´ë™ ìƒì„±ì í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ê¸°

    L-valueì´ì§€ë§Œ ì´ë™ ìƒì„±ìë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ê³  ì‹¶ë‹¤ë©´? ğŸ‘‰ std::moveë¥¼ í†µí•´ R-valueë¡œ ë°”ê¿”ì£¼ë©´ ëœë‹¤.

    ğŸ“œmain.cpp

    #include <iostream>
#include <utility> // âœ¨âœ¨

int main()
{
	{
		AutoPtr<Resource> res1(new Resource(10000000));

		cout << res1.m_ptr << endl;

		AutoPtr<Resource> res2 = std::move(res1); // ì´ë™ ìƒì„±ìê°€ í˜¸ì¶œëœë‹¤. std::moveëŠ” res1ì„ R-Value ë¡œ ë°”ê¿”ì¤€ë‹¤. 

		cout << res1.m_ptr << endl;
		cout << res2.m_ptr << endl;
	}
}

    ğŸ”” Copy Semantics VS Move Semantics

    #include <iostream>
#include <utility> // âœ¨âœ¨
#include <vector>

int main()
{
	{
		vector<string> v;
		string str = "Hello";

		v.push_back(str);

		cout << str << endl;
		cout << v[0] << endl;

		v.push_back(std::move(str));

		cout << str << endl;
		cout << v[0] << " " << v[1] << endl;
	}
}

    std::vectorì˜ push_backì€ L-Value Reference ì™€ R-Value Reference ì— ë”°ë¼ ì˜¤ë²„ë¡œë”©ì´ ë˜ì–´ìˆìŒ

    • ğŸ’™copy semantics ì‚¬ìš©
      • string str = "Hello";

          • ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ ê¹Šì€ ë³µì‚¬ë¡œ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì„ ë³µì‚¬í•´ì˜¨ ê²ƒì´ë¼ì„œ ì—¬ì „íˆ strì´ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ëŠ” ê³³ì—ë„ â€œHelloâ€ê°ì²´ê°€ ìˆê³  v[0]ì´ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ëŠ” ê³³ì—ë„ â€œHelloâ€ ê°ì²´ê°€ ìˆë‹¤.
    • ğŸ’™move semantics ì‚¬ìš©
      • v.push_back(std::move(str));
        • R-Value ë¡œì„œ strë¥¼ v[1]ì— move ì‹œí‚´

    ğŸ””ë²ˆì™¸) ì´ë™ ìƒì„±ìê°€ ëŠ˜ ë” ë¹ ë¥¸ ê²ƒì€ ì•„ë‹ˆë‹¤.
